description:
Value-based preset view for serialization and change notifications

# Purpose Used in `SetupChangedType::SpeakerOutputPresetProcessing` to notify clients of scalar field changes. Contains only the scalar fields (not complex objects like crossover, EQ, FIR, limiters) which are notified separately.

# Why Separate from PresetProcessingView? - This is for change notifications (what changed) - PresetProcessingView is for full state queries (what is) - Splitting reduces notification payload size

delay.description: Preset delay in milliseconds (None if locked)

gain.description: Preset gain trim in dB (None if locked)

preset_customized.description: Whether the preset has been customized after application

preset_metadata.description: Applied preset metadata (name, ID, etc.) - None if no preset is applied

title: PresetProcessingValueView
